author: bayard
msg: tests updated to not need the removed month/year milli estimates

author: bayard
msg: teach me to commit without a compile. Removed an  overloaded method, so needs another parameter to hit a different overload

author: bayard
msg: removed the weak assumptions for number of millis in a month/year from DateUtils. Implemented a second format method that relies on a start and an end in DurationFormatUtils, though I found that TimeZone was very important in the overloaded millis version. The two methods hand off to each other depending on whether the time is > or < than 28 days
